attributes.action: Abolish serving alcohol during working hours in Westminster Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: It is not appropriate to consume alcohol whilst being responsible for coherent decision making that effects lives of the British public.
attributes.background: Cease to sell alcohol both before, and during parliament working hours including lunch breaks.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

Make it illegal for MPs over the drink drive limit to participate in Parliament: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604154

Ban alcohol in the Houses of Parliament and all government buildings.: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604101
